resources.string: TRUSTED: Indicates that the user has indicated implicit trust of this network. This generally means it\'s a sim-selected carrier, a plugged in ethernet, a paired BT device or a wifi the user asked to connect to. Untrusted networks are probably limited to unknown wifi AP. Set by default.\n\n VALIDATED: Indicates that connectivity on this network was successfully validated. For example, for a network with NET_CAPABILITY_INTERNET, it means that Internet connectivity was successfully detected.
